body.name: Decdeal Handheld Steam Cleaner, High Temperature Pressurized Steam Cleaning Machine for Kitchen Sofa Bathroom Car (A)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 2 mins
features: 【High Temperature and Pressurized】With 1050W high power to generate 135℃ high temperature,the pressure steam up to 3.0bar, effectively remove stubborn greasy dirt. It will automatically power off if the water in the tank runs out.

【Large Capacity & Fast Heating】350ml water tank capacity (recommend filling 200ml with water) can provide continuous steam for about 10 minutes without adding water frequently. Only need about 3 minutes to produce pressurized hot steam quickly.

【Deep Cleaning】Extending hose for getting into tight spaces and hard to reach areas for a through cleaning. 360°rotatig nozzle can clean blind spots.【Portable & Compact】 Handheld design and compact body with 2.8m power cord make it easy to clean hard to reach areas and achieve cross-regional cleaning.
【User-friendly Design】Safety cap on the top and safety lock on the handle can protect you from being scalded to ensure safe use. 【High Quality】Made of premium ABS material, use steam for cleaning.
【Wide Application】The steam cleaner can be used for cleaning washing machine, wall, floor, window, door, upholstery and more, widely applied in kitchen, bathroom, furniture, car, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Never gets hot enough to clean
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely NO RESPONSE from customer support website.Looks like a gimmick to keep buyers from getting refunds on sub-par products.This steam cleaner does not do what a steam cleaner is supposed to do.About this item (Description on Amazon)"【High Temperature and Pressurized】With 1050W high power to generate 135℃ high temperature,the pressure steam up to 3.0barThe box says 900- 1050 Watt300ml2.8barIt only reaches up to 96°C or 204°F for a split second and then goes down below 80° C/176° F and fails to keep that temperature.In order to get any pressure I have to press the trigger REALLY HARD with both hands.In order to disinfect it needs to be in the range of 121°C (250°F) and 132°C (270°F)."【Large Capacity & Fast Heating】350ml water tank capacity (recommend filling 200ml with water) can provide continuous steam for about 10 minutes without adding water frequently. Only need about 3 minutes to produce pressurized hot steam quickly."It does NOT provide continuous steam. Steam comes out in spurts for a few seconds, even when I'm holding the trigger in as hard as I can. Usually it's not even hot enough for steam and spurts warm water and air. Sometimes nothing comes out at all and I have to unplug it, wait for it to cool down and start over to get it to do anything. The instructions on the User's Manual says to let it boil for 5 to 10 minutes. The INDICATOR LIGHT goes off in 3 minutes, but that doesn't mean it's ready.I left a message with the customer support website and I'm waiting to hear back. It was just a simple web form and I don't know what info they need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does not have a switch to turn on and off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like it a lot
reviews.reviewText: All of my parts was there. Worked perfectly fine FOR ME. I actually had so much fun cleaning walls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 10/24/23. I just opened the box to use 02/7/24. Steam and boiling water came out from the seam on this product I burnt my hand. Of course I could not find any warranty on the paperwork. Of course had to pick one star would not let me leave it blank!Rachael/Texas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke right out of the box zero stars all around
reviews.reviewText: You sent me a unit that was preowned and returned to you. There were parts missing and the parts that were there were just stuck in the box. There was residue on some of the parts indicating they were used before. There were no instructions or warranty at all. The unit did heat up but the trigger did not work. No steam would come out when the trigger was pulled. Nothing I could do made this work. After letting it cool I could not remove the cap. It would just turn. Had to use a wrench to relieve the pressure. This is not my first steam cleaner but it will be the last of this brand. Just send a truck to pick it up. I'm not spending time sending it back. I am a partially disabled veteran and cannot just run around returning Broken(New) purchases.I'm surprised that amazon would have a practice of repackaging broken products.Update, Cannot contact decdeal.what a surprise. link dont work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good little tool
reviews.reviewText: This is such a awesome little steamer. It’s cord is a bit short and it sometimes seems like it’s out of water when it isn’t, but still it cleans well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product does not work. Steam was spraying everywhere besides the nozzle. And it burned my arm and face!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The nozzles and hose will not fit on machine
